general_advisory: Kharif crop 2024: 1. Due to Forecast of Light to Moderate rainfall from 7th Sept. Farmers are advised to do not apply of fertilizer & chemical induring this period. 2. Strengthen the bunds of paddy field and check any rat holes or leakage from the bund. 3. After rain trim the bund and keep clean to avoid any insect multiplication.

advisory: Regular monitoring of the crop for incidence of pest and diseases should be done.
After the rain, there is chances of infestation of leaf folder and Yellow Stem Borer will increase so apply Cartap hydrochloride 50SP@ 400g/acre or Fipronil 5 SC @ 400ml/acre.
After rain there is chances of insect pest attack, survey regularly and take action by taking advice from department personnel.
Go for intercultural operation and apply 26 kg urea per acre at 45 days after planting and apply mulching @ 2 t/acre.
Do not allow water to remain stagnant in the field.
Due to weather there is chances of Aphids in Maize, to manage this, apply Dimethoate @ 2 ml/liter of water.
Due to weather tikka disease is seen, to manage this spray Carbendazim @ 2 g/liter of water.
Do not allow stagnation of water as papaya plant is very sensitive to water logging.
Drench Carbendazim or Mancozeb @ 2 g/lt of water near the root zone to avoid any type of fungal diseases.
Do not allow the rainwater to remain stagnant near the base of the plant.
Provide stakings to the newly planted saplings to avoid wind damage.
To manage Thrips population in chilli, spray Imidachloprid or Dimethoate @ 2ml/lt of water.
Provide regular feeding @ 0.35 of body mass.
Provide clean drinking water to poultry. Take preventive action for any disease in consultation of department personnel.
